description.value: When making a Charge Action whilst wearing a Jump Pack, melee attacks deal an extra 1d10 Damage per Two Degrees of Success on their Weapon Skill Test, up to 2d10.

system.benefit: When making a Charge Action whilst wearing a Jump Pack, melee attacks deal an extra 1d10 Damage per Two Degrees of Success on their Weapon Skill Test, up to 2d10.
